author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Amardeep Singh Jhajj for "Main storefront page, Featured Products (middle column) overwrites right column. Should just crop column, but not overwrite right column." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2602
Simply increases the width of the left and right screens. It is more appropriate UX and fixes the issue. Checked in Safari MAC OS (8.0) and latest Google Chrome, Firefox, it is working fine there.
